monogr.title: The Nestorians, or the Lost Tribes: Containing Evidence of Their Identity; an Account of Their Manners, Customs, and Ceremonies; together with Sketches of Travel in Ancient Assyria, Armenia, Media, and Mesopotamia; and Illustration of Scripture Prophecy

body.bibl: Grant, Asahel. The Nestorians, or the Lost Tribes: Containing Evidence of Their Identity; an Account of Their Manners, Customs, and Ceremonies; Together with Sketches of Travel in Ancient Assyria, Armenia, Media, and Mesopotamia; and Illustration of Scripture Prophecy. London: John Murray, 1841.

Asahel Grant, The Nestorians, or the Lost Tribes: Containing Evidence of Their Identity; an Account of Their Manners, Customs, and Ceremonies; Together with Sketches of Travel in Ancient Assyria, Armenia, Media, and Mesopotamia; and Illustration of Scripture Prophecy (London: John Murray, 1841).
